title: Exp Level
description: The following is a figure of estimates of <:aowcoin:847363788566560798> needed to advance to each Exp level (for example, to advance from level 69 to level 70, about 136M <:aowcoin:847363788566560798> is needed). The figure assumes players only obtain Exp points through 4-star troops draws and lucky draws. In reality, players would also get Exp points from other means such as clan rewards, arena rewards, hero events, and super cards, so the actual coin amount should be less.
